body_html:
So the default alignment looks like below, which is also more than 80 chars

    const CFStringRef str = (CFStringRef)CFDictionaryGetValue(cuda_driver_info,
                                                              kCFBundleVersionKey);

This Mac API is like Java, kind of a pain to get to fit

An alternative could be

    const CFStringRef str =
      (CFStringRef)CFDictionaryGetValue(cuda_driver_info, kCFBundleVersionKey);
